review.comment: Always make me feel at ease.  Explain the procedures so I’m fully aware of what to expect.  Would definitely recommend 😊 xx
Easy booking; lovely, friendly staff and excellent doctors who really take care of you while discussing and carrying out treatments.

All good reviews seems to be fake and we are looking into this. My Aunt have got her botox done and they made a blunder. They make every excuses when the botox treatment dint work, regardless of this working or not thats a different chapter but they have completely made it worse for my aunt facial appearance. No pre consultation done before the treatment  however  patients will fall prey to to their sugar coating talks. They are so much commercial that on the day of the treatment they wont even discuss anything with the patient but gives limited time, tell the  patient where they will inject the botox injection, ask them to lay on the slaughter house chair and injects the botox injections which is prefilled and in 5 minutes its all done, a proper slaughterhouse. Im a blogger and will need to spread the word against them that they need to stop such practice.
review.review_reply:
Dear Dania Khan, unfortunately as you have not specified who your “Aunty” is, we cannot identify the person whom you are referring to and whether we actually treated them. Please contact us so we can look into this matter further for you.

All patients are entitled to reviews so that we can do everything we possibly can to make you happy.

review.comment: Communication before the appointment was brilliant. Information great throughout. A professional and efficient service throughout the whole process. Highly recommend. Thank you.
I, who am a big cry baby, cannot wait to go again. I ws treated with care all the time. Thank you.

Highly recommend this clinic always very happy with my treatments done by very experience doctors always welcome bye the very friendly staff personally I go to the Surrey clinic which is closer to where I live and I wouldn’t want to go anywhere else . Thank you for looking after me .

I had a non surgical rhinoplasty done at the Maidstone Dermis Clinic today. I was a little apprehensive about the procedure but after seeing the results of other clients on their instagram page, I couldn’t wait any longer to book an appointment! The clinic was very clean and sterile, and I was greeted by two lovely, welcoming staff. I was made to feel at ease the entire appointment, and the results are outstanding, I nearly cried. Thank you so much, I can’t wait to come back!
Lovely clinic, easy to find and park. Appointment was fine. On time and clean and professional.
Very impressed I would thoroughly recommend them
Friendly and kind staff who put me at ease and talked me through every step.

I have been here 3 times now for lip augmentation, i am always so impressed with the staff and the location in Coulsdon.
I am in love with how my lips look, Dr Arf does such wonderful work, couldn’t recommend them enough!
Visited this clinic three times for nose filler and the results have been great. Thanks to Sef & Arf.

If you want a first class experience then this is the place. I continue be delighted with the outcome, providing me with a refreshed look exactly as I had requested.  From the first initial phone call to the consultation to the treatment I couldn't recommend this clinic any more than giving it the 5* it truly deserves.  Arf is a master in his profession.
great experience fab results very happy!
So pleased with my results! The clinic is so lovely & clean. Made to feel so welcome and really looked after while I was there!

Amazing service from start to finish! Have been coming to Dermis Clinic since they first opened in Coulsdon and wouldn't trust anyone else with my face. Both Dr Sef and Arf are great - listen to and talk through exactly what you want and I've never had an issue at all. Incredibly personable experience, from reception through to treatment - would recommend to anyone!
Very clean, friendly staff and a get service. Highly recommend

Arf and Helen have made my experience of aesthetics a positive one. Arf will not do anything that he feels would not be suitable for you, I have lots of confidence in Arf that he will only undertake safe procedures that are suitable for your needs; for me I wanted a natural look and that’s what I got! This isn’t about financial gain this is about professional and safe results I would rather pay more to know that I will be well looked after. I highly recommend Dermis clinics  and will definitely be going back. Thanks to Arf and Helen. Xx💖

Sarah - Kate put me at complete ease as my numbing cream was applied, nothing seemed too much trouble.
Dr Sef was quick and efficient , explained how Morphous 8 worked.
Looking forward to seeing the results .
Thank you

I have been seeing Arf for Botox and fillers for around 18 months now and he has given me so much more self esteem. The filler packages are so affordable and really have been life changing for me. Arf is very skilled and knows what he is doing! The admin staff are amazing too (particular shout out to Helen!). The clinic itself is modern and clean and I never have an issue with parking.

I will never go elsewhere, unless it’s for something surgical.

Amazing!

I have previously had a serious migration issue with another practice which landed me in hospital so it was a big deal for me to get it redone and to put trust in someone again.

Arf at the Coulsdon/Surrey clinic has been amazing!
I had the 3ml filler plan and feel so much more confident and happy with myself. Arf and Helen are such lovely people.

Thank you Dermis, will be back for my top ups !

Honestly can recommend dr sef enough, I’m super scared of blood let alone needles. And esp on my face. But love aesthetics… he knows how nervous I get, but he is soo gentle , honestly the pain is like a 2/10. He altered my lips/ nose, and talked me through what he was doing calmly. Kept checking I was okay, and happy with my results, gave me after care and spoke to me about other things to distract me from my fears. Can’t recommend dermis clinics enough, the staff are all lovely, Helen looks after me throughout the process after and chiefs I have all available info for aftercare.
Really pleased with my over all experience 10/10 ❤️
I would not go anywhere else for my treatments, Dr. Sef is the best!!

If I could give dermis 10 stars I would! Highly recommend Arf, he has made my aesthetic dreams come true! I’ve had fillers and Botox with Arf and as a result I’ve never received so many compliments! I’ve been returning over the last year/two and  I would never go anywhere else now. Arf really knows what he is doing and I trust him 100%. Thank you so much, you have a customer for life 😊
I absolutely LOVE visiting Dermis Clinic. The girls on front desk are so friendly and helpful and Dr Sef is a miracle worker. I’ve recommended them to all of my friends ❤️
Absolutely amazing service! Arf is the most professional aesthetician I’ve ever come across and he’s truly a delight! Wonderful team - especially Helen!

I have never had Botox before going to Dermis clinic, so friendly and put me at ease, I wanted four areas but they  recommended 3 so definitely not out for just your money. Very professional and the clinic is what you would call fabulous. I can honestly say I didn’t feel a thing I go back in two weeks for a review. I can’t wait to see the effects. Thank you Derma clinic look forward to seeing you again.

Dermis Clinic is amazing! Everyone there is very helpful. I’ve seen both Dr’s there and both were super professional and friendly! My treatment was Nose filler, and I cannot believe how perfect my nose is! I love dermis clinic :)
Beautiful clinic and Arf was incredible! Highly recommend!
Great team , and really pleased with the results 😁
Professionalism cleanliness friendly amazing results … they have it all !

I cannot rate the service at Dermis highly enough  - on all fronts.  I have been going to Dr Sef since 2019 and he has, over time transformed my skin and face with a combination of fillers, profhilo and botox. He has listened, advised , shown patience and such skill - knowing that I wanted very natural results that were more akin to looking like I had been on a great holiday! :-)

My Mum who is in her 60s is now also a patient of his and we both really look forward to our clinic visits to maintain our results.

The client service at Dermis should also be highlighted as such a positive - Sarah Kate and Helen are so friendly , efficient and patient. Thank you all so much x

I cannot rate the service at Dermis highly enough - on all fronts . I have been going to Dr Sef since 2019 and he has , over time transformed my skin and face . He has listened, advised and shown patience and such skill / knowing that I wanted very natural results that were more akin to looking like I’d had a good holiday ! 🤣  my mum ( who is in her 60s) is now a patient of his and we both really look forward to our visits to the clinic to maintain the results of initial packages .

The client service at Dermis should also be highlighted as such a positive - Sarah Kate and Helen are so friendly, efficient and patient !!
Thank you all so much !

I Always have a great experience at dermis clinic, the receptionist helen is welcoming and professional. Arf is always professional and listens carefully to what you want and gives advice if he needs to.
Great team!

Best clinic around. I wouldn’t trust anyone else on my face haha. Always so clean and hygienic and the staff are all sooooo lovely. Genuinely love coming here for treatments. I have referred loafs of people here who all agree with me too!

Thanks again 🙂

Absolutely LOVE visiting Dermis, super professional and always a pleasure to see the girls and doctors that work there at all branches. They will always be honest with you and I feel a million dollars every time I leave. Completely painless, cannot reccomend their work enough - don't even hesitate to book you are in EXCELLENT hands! x
Always a lovely experience when visiting Dermis clinic. I’m so nervous when having any procedure however they always reassure me and talk me through the process! Highly recommend!!
I wouldn’t trust anyone else with face. Always a delightful experience. I close my eyes and let Arf work his magic.

Stay away from this clinic! The 1* review below is accurate. Lots of fake reviews on Google reviews, do your research!

The clinic will make excuses when the procedure doesn't work and try to extort more money out of you for corrections. I ended up going to the small claims court for a refund.

Edit (2022): The clinic offered a full refund 3 days before the Court date, 1+ year after the procedure.

The whole experience with the team from the initial enquiry I sent, to the actual day of my appointment was delightful.

Dr Arf was calming and professional throughout my nose filler treatment. As someone of a nervous disposition - who's also never had any type of filler previously, I felt completely relaxed and put at ease, Dr Arf was calming and attentive, aswell as very knowledgeable, explaining the process throughout clearly, answering any questions that arose.

Incredibly skilled with the needle, so gentle I barely felt a thing. A few months have passed since my top up and I'm absolutely loving my improved nose! I could never had anticipated the results, beyond expectations. Highly recommended! I shall definitely be visiting again.

This was my second visit to have my lips done. Very happy with the results. Totally
recommend. X

Dermis clinic is the only place I will visit for my fillers! Over the years I have visited a few times and each occasion has been a pleasant experience. Very professional, great results and a positive overall environment where your desires are heard and taken care of. Thank you , highly recommend to family and friends. It has really improved my confidence by the slight chances that are made, very natural look and long lasting fillers :)

Arf and Helen made me feel so comfortable on my visit. My Lips look absolutely amazing 👏🏼 😍 the compliments I have had have been incredible.
I 💯 recommend going to Dermis Clinic...Trust me you will not be disappointed..Well done guys keep doing what you do best xxx
